com.team6133.frc2018

Class Kinematics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team6133.frc2018.Kinematics

  • public class Kinematics
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides forward and inverse kinematics equations for the robot modeling the wheelbase as a differential drive (with a corrective factor to account for skidding).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Kinematics.DriveVelocity
      Class that contains left and right wheel velocities

    • Constructor Summary

      Kinematics()

      Forward kinematics using only encoders, rotation is implicit (less accurate than below, but useful for predicting motion)

      Forward kinematics using encoders and explicitly measured rotation (ex.
      static Twist2d forwardKinematics(Rotation2d prev_heading, double left_wheel_delta, double right_wheel_delta, Rotation2d current_heading)

      static RigidTransform2d integrateForwardKinematics(RigidTransform2d current_pose, double left_wheel_delta, double right_wheel_delta, Rotation2d current_heading)

      For convenience, integrate forward kinematics with a Twist2d and previous rotation.
      static Kinematics.DriveVelocity inverseKinematics(Twist2d velocity)
      Uses inverse kinematics to convert a Twist2d into left and right wheel velocities
